item.title: ‘Midnight Rider’ Director Randall Miller Sues DGA to Overturn Lifetime Ban
item.description: Randall Miller, the director who served a year in a Georgia jail for a fatal accident on the set of “Midnight Rider,” has sued the Directors Guild of America in a bid to overturn his lifet
